# Types

- [Selective]({{< var ref-attention.selective >}}): The ability to attend to a task despite all of the other stimuli around
- [Sustained]({{< var ref-attention.sustained >}}): The ability to maintain consistent response during a continuous activity
- [Divided]({{< var ref-attention.divided >}}): The capacity to respond to 2+ stimuli
- [Alternating]({{< var ref-attention.alternating >}}): The ability to move flexibly between tasks and respond appropriately to demands of each
